overview: A young writer, John Hale, inherits a fortune and moves into an alleged-haunted castle with his servant "Rusty." He discovers the 'hauntee' to be Countess von Baden, hiding in a secret chamber with her son, whom the court has awarded to her divorced husband.
tagline: HERE IS THE PICTURE YOU'VE BEEN WAITING FOR! See it...hear it...forget your troubles!
title: A Royal Romance
